resources.string: San choy bau is a dish embraced by all ages. Sweet, sour and salty flavours meet tender, crispy and crunchy textures all wrapped up like a present!
Coles Extra Lean Pork Mince, peanut oil, ginger, lettuce leaves, roasted peanuts

Heat wok over high heat until hot. Add peanut oil and swirl to coat. Add garlic, ginger and pork. Stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes or until pork just changes colour. Add soy sauce and oyster. Add shallots, 2 teaspoons of lime juice and sesame oil to wok. Stir-fry for 3 minutes or until heated through. Stir in beansprouts. Spoon pork mixture into lettuce leaves. Sprinkle with coriander and peanuts, if using. Serve.
